#summary Call when you want to get a specific key


{{{
getServerEntry(key:Object)
}}}

=== Description ===

Use this function when you want to access a specific [ServerEntry] without having to go through the server.


=== Parameters ===

key - the key of the requested [ServerEntry]


=== Returns ===

Returns  [ServerEntry] — A [ServerEntry] with the specified key requested.
